TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Why sir, that where the valet boys parked your car!

Waiter, there's a forum game in my soup

Oh dear, I am terribly sorry, sir. Those can get very big very fast, and it might take a while to pull out one that's become as long as this one. I'll go have the chef make you some more in the meantime.

Waiter, my soup is in a superfluid state and is escaping the bowl!

souperfluid ha ha ha ha

Let me just increase the temperature.

Waiter, there's some hope in humanity in my soup!

Too bad.

*evil waiter throws soup into the sun*

Waiter, there's a Chuck Norris in my soup!

No, it's Chuck Norris's soup now.

Waiter, there's a happening in my soup.

Oh, no sir, I can assure you that we do not allow happening in this establishment.

Waiter! My soup is behaving as though the speed of light is a centimeter per second! It keeps undergoing fusion with my spoon, waiter!

Theoretically the spoon is faster than light, but Einstein is dead, so I can't do anything.

Waiter, there's a pile of chemicals in my soup! They aren't water or food.

I'm sorry, but you ordered a chemical soup. Be more careful next time.

Waiter, there's a Waiter in my soup!

Um, yes, sir, you might want to talk to my boss about that, sir.

What the heck, Steve?

Waiter! My soup is resonating!

*waiter changes resonating soup with normal soup*

Waiter, there's a Waiter with a Waiter in his soup in my soup!

Oops, *switches psilocybin soup with normal soup*

just wait a couple hours and they will be gone

Waiter! These an intake bobbing in my soup!

Is Jeb cooking today? I'll be back...

Waiter, the waiter never came back!

Umm, i think you should tell the boss about that, sir.

Waiter, there's a soup in my soup!

Who cares?

Waiter, there's an Alemagno injecting pure spam into my soup!

Let me ban him. Here here...

Waiter! There's a ÃÂ¼ÃÂ¸Ã‘â€šÃÂ±Ã‘Å½Ã‘ÂÃ‘â€šÃÂµÃ‘â‚¬Ã‘Â844 in my soup!

Might I interest you with our finest Google Translate meal? =]

Waiter, there's a beret wearing walrus in my soup.

That's Jamie Hyneman from Mythbusters.

Waiter, there's a a s'ereht ,retiaW

Uh oh, you just breaked the laws of space and time.

Waiter, there's a Kerbal in my soup!

Hi Jeb!

Waiter, there's a big red button in my soup that says "Ban Alemagno"!

No, sir, that appears to be a Staples Easy button, sir. I'm afraid the buttons to ban patrons exist only in the moderator booth, on the other side of that bulletproof semisilvered glass wall.

Waitress! There's a male-dominated society in my soup!

I am not that concerned about that, even though I may decide to be a turn into a girl when I grow up.

Waiter, my new avatar is in my soup!

Oh sorry! I'll bring It back to the kitchen.

WAITER! There's a live Headcrab in my soup!

It's dead, but it looks alive to you.

Waiter, there's a big red button in my soup!

That's a tomato.

Waiter, there's a +1 cube in my soup! What does it add to?

Wait, cube has four letters. 4 - 1 = 3. Illuminiti has 3 sides. CUBE IZ ILLUMINARTY!11! [heavy dubstep plays in background] MUM GET THE CAMMMRAH!

Waiter! There's a ( ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â° ÃÅ“ÃŠâ€“ ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â°) in my soup!
